title: Using AWS Lambda and Amazon Comprehend to detect text language
description: AWS Lambda function that calls Amazon Comprehend service to detect text language using Boto3 SDK.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern shows how to deploy a SAM template that builds a Lambda function which calls Amazon Comprehend for detecting the dominant language in a text.
